entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Orillia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:59 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Simcoe Regional Airport 10:00 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022
Temperature: -6.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -9.8°C
Wind: WSW 20 km/h gust 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries and snow squalls. Blowing snow early this evening. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls early in the morning. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Snow beginning late in the evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022
